Html:
I see theres a mention of requiring programmers assistance with warlocks, but no direct mention of issues with stats.

When I import my lock from the armory, the stats seem to be quite different to what Rawr suggests, basically all my stats i.e Rawr suggests my mana is 13k, armory/game = 17k unbuffed. Crit, Int, Spirit etc all different.  Game reflects the armory but rawr seems way out.   Is this a known issue?
Possibly. If you attach the character file to a new Issue, ArPharazon can check it out.
Could be something to do with using the Gnome racial. Selecting some of the other racials gets the stats 'closer' to what they should be, but still not what i'd expect.  Cheers, will do that.
